mapper.select: select coer.order_id,coer.id,coer.security_code,coer.ex_entrust_id,coer.entrust_id ,coer.product_name,coer.product_code,(case when coer.trade_direction = 1 then '看多' else '看空' end) tradeTypeFmt ,(case when coer.trade_type = 1 then '开仓' else '平仓' end) userTradeTypeFmt ,coer.entrust_count,coer.entrust_price,coer.create_date,coer.modify_date ,(case when coer.entrust_status = 1 then '成功' else '失败' end) status_fmt, (case when coer.trigger_type=100 then '用户触发' when coer.trigger_type=101 then '人工触发' when coer.trigger_type=102 then '系统清仓' when coer.trigger_type=103 then '风控触发' else '其他' end) triggerTypeFmt, coer.entrust_type,coer.error_msg,coer.account_id from order_cash_entrust_child_info coer where coer.id=#{id}
